111    /**
112     * XStream (http://xstream.codehaus.org/) based XML configuration class.
113     * 
114     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
115     */
116    public class XMLConfigurer implements Configurer
117    {
118            /**
119             * The converter is needed to allow the rendering of Assert's expr attribute value as an XML node value and not an XML attribute
120             * <code>&lt;assert&gt;&lt;expr&gt;...&lt;/expr&gt;&lt;/assert&gt;</code> instead of <code>&lt;assert expr="..."&gt;</code>
121             * This allows users to write complex, multi-line expressions. 
122             */
123            protected static final class AssertCheckConverter implements Converter
124            {
125                    /**
126                     * {@inheritDoc}
127                     */
128                    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
129                    public boolean canConvert(final Class clazz)
130                    {
131                            return clazz.equals(AssertCheck.class);
132                    }
133    
134                    /**
135                     * {@inheritDoc}
136                     */
137                    public void marshal(final Object value, final HierarchicalStreamWriter writer, final MarshallingContext context)
138                    {
139                            final AssertCheck assertCheck = (AssertCheck) value;
140                            writer.addAttribute("lang", assertCheck.getLang());
141                            if (!"net.sf.oval.constraint.Assert.violated".equals(assertCheck.getMessage()))
142                                    writer.addAttribute("message", assertCheck.getMessage());
143                            if (!"net.sf.oval.constraint.Assert".equals(assertCheck.getErrorCode()))
144                                    writer.addAttribute("errorCode", assertCheck.getErrorCode());
145                            writer.addAttribute("severity", Integer.toString(assertCheck.getSeverity()));
146                            if (assertCheck.getWhen() != null) writer.addAttribute("when", assertCheck.getWhen());
147                            writer.startNode("expr");
148                            writer.setValue(assertCheck.getExpr());
149                            writer.endNode();
150                            final String[] profiles = assertCheck.getProfiles();
151                            if (profiles != null && profiles.length > 0)
152                            {
153                                    writer.startNode("profiles");
154                                    for (final String profile : profiles)
155                                    {
156                                            writer.startNode("string");
157                                            writer.setValue(profile);
158                                            writer.endNode();
159                                    }
160                                    writer.endNode();
161                            }
162                            final ConstraintTarget[] appliesTo = assertCheck.getAppliesTo();
163                            if (appliesTo != null && appliesTo.length > 0)
164                            {
165                                    writer.startNode("appliesTo");
166                                    for (final ConstraintTarget ctarget : appliesTo)
167                                    {
168                                            writer.startNode("constraintTarget");
169                                            writer.setValue(ctarget.name());
170                                            writer.endNode();
171                                    }
172                                    writer.endNode();
173                            }
174                    }
175    
176                    /**
177                     * {@inheritDoc}
178                     */
179                    public Object unmarshal(final HierarchicalStreamReader reader, final UnmarshallingContext context)
180                    {
181                            final AssertCheck assertCheck = new AssertCheck();
182                            assertCheck.setLang(reader.getAttribute("lang"));
183                            assertCheck.setMessage(reader.getAttribute("message"));
184                            assertCheck.setErrorCode(reader.getAttribute("errorCode"));
185                            if (reader.getAttribute("severity") != null)
186                                    assertCheck.setSeverity(Integer.parseInt(reader.getAttribute("severity")));
187                            assertCheck.setWhen(reader.getAttribute("when"));
188    
189                            reader.moveDown();
190                            assertCheck.setExpr(reader.getValue());
191                            reader.moveUp();
192                            if (reader.hasMoreChildren())
193                            {
194                                    reader.moveDown();
195                                    if ("appliesTo".equals(reader.getNodeName()))
196                                    {
197                                            final List<ConstraintTarget> targets = new ArrayList<ConstraintTarget>(2);
198                                            while (reader.hasMoreChildren())
199                                            {
200                                                    reader.moveDown();
201                                                    if ("constraintTarget".equals(reader.getNodeName()))
202                                                            targets.add(ConstraintTarget.valueOf(reader.getValue()));
203                                                    reader.moveUp();
204                                            }
205                                            assertCheck.setAppliesTo(targets.toArray(new ConstraintTarget[targets.size()]));
206                                    }
207                                    else if ("profiles".equals(reader.getNodeName()))
208                                    {
209                                            final List<String> profiles = new ArrayList<String>(4);
210                                            while (reader.hasMoreChildren())
211                                            {
212                                                    reader.moveDown();
213                                                    if ("string".equals(reader.getNodeName())) profiles.add(reader.getValue());
214                                                    reader.moveUp();
215                                            }
216                                            assertCheck.setProfiles(profiles.toArray(new String[profiles.size()]));
217                                    }
218                                    reader.moveUp();
219                            }
220                            return assertCheck;
221                    }
222            }
223    
224            private static final class ListConverter extends CollectionConverter
225            {
226                    protected ListConverter(final Mapper mapper)
227                    {
228                            super(mapper);
229                    }
230    
231                    /**
232                     * {@inheritDoc}
233                     */
234                    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
235                    @Override
236                    public boolean canConvert(final Class type)
237                    {
238                            return List.class.isAssignableFrom(type);
239                    }
240            }
241    
242            /**
243             * This reflection provider applies default values declared on constraint annotations to the corresponding check class
244             */
245            protected static final class XStreamReflectionProvider extends Sun14ReflectionProvider
246            {
247                    @Override
248                    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
249                    public Object newInstance(final Class type)
250                    {
251                            final Object instance = super.newInstance(type);
252    
253                            // test if a AnnotationCheck instance is requested 
254                            if (instance instanceof AbstractAnnotationCheck)
255                            {
256                                    // determine the constraint annotation
257                                    Class<Annotation> constraintAnnotation = null;
258                                    final ParameterizedType genericSuperclass = (ParameterizedType) type.getGenericSuperclass();
259                                    for (final Type genericType : genericSuperclass.getActualTypeArguments())
260                                    {
261                                            final Class genericClass = (Class) genericType;
262                                            if (genericClass.isAnnotation() && genericClass.isAnnotationPresent(Constraint.class))
263                                            {
264                                                    constraintAnnotation = genericClass;
265                                                    break;
266                                            }
267                                    }
268                                    // in case we could determine the constraint annotation, read the attributes and 
269                                    // apply the declared default values to the check instance
270                                    if (constraintAnnotation != null) for (final Method m : constraintAnnotation.getMethods())
271                                    {
272                                            final Object defaultValue = m.getDefaultValue();
273                                            if (defaultValue != null) ReflectionUtils.setViaSetter(instance, m.getName(), defaultValue);
274                                    }
275                            }
276                            return instance;
277                    }
278            }

284            private POJOConfigurer pojoConfigurer = new POJOConfigurer();

286            private final XStream xStream;
287    
288            /**
289             * creates an XMLConfigurer instance backed by a new XStream instance 
290             * using the com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.StaxDriver for XML parsing 
291             * if the StAX API is available
292             * @see com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.StaxDriver
293             */
294            public XMLConfigurer()
295            {
296                    final HierarchicalStreamDriver xmlDriver = //
297                    ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader") ? new StaxDriver() : //
298                                    ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.xmlpull.mxp1.MXParser") ? new XppDriver() : //
299                                                    new DomDriver();
300                    LOG.info("XML driver implementation: {1}", xmlDriver.getClass().getName());
301                    xStream = new XStream(new XStreamReflectionProvider(), xmlDriver);
302                    configureXStream();
303            }
304    
305            private void configureXStream()
306            {
307                    xStream.registerConverter(new ListConverter(xStream.getMapper()));
308                    xStream.registerConverter(new AssertCheckConverter());
309    
310                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Class.class);
311                    xStream.useAttributeFor(boolean.class);
312                    xStream.useAttributeFor(byte.class);
313                    xStream.useAttributeFor(char.class);
314                    xStream.useAttributeFor(double.class);
315                    xStream.useAttributeFor(float.class);
316                    xStream.useAttributeFor(int.class);
317                    xStream.useAttributeFor(long.class);
318                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Boolean.class);
319                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Byte.class);
320                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Character.class);
321                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Double.class);
322                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Float.class);
323                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Integer.class);
324                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Long.class);
325                    xStream.useAttributeFor(String.class);
326    
327                    xStream.alias("java-type", Class.class);
328                    xStream.alias("constraintTarget", ConstraintTarget.class);
329    
330                    // constraint check short forms
331                    xStream.alias("assert", AssertCheck.class);
332                    xStream.alias("assertConstraintSet", AssertConstraintSetCheck.class);
333                    xStream.alias("assertFalse", AssertFalseCheck.class);
334                    xStream.alias("assertFieldConstraints", AssertFieldConstraintsCheck.class);
335                    xStream.alias("assertNull", AssertNullCheck.class);
336                    xStream.alias("assertTrue", AssertTrueCheck.class);
337                    {
338                            xStream.alias("assertURL", AssertURLCheck.class);
339                            xStream.alias("permittedURIScheme", URIScheme.class);
340                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(AssertURLCheck.class, "permittedURISchemes", URIScheme.class);
341                    }
342                    xStream.alias("assertValid", AssertValidCheck.class);
343                    xStream.alias("checkWith", CheckWithCheck.class);
344                    xStream.alias("dateRange", DateRangeCheck.class);
345                    xStream.alias("digits", DigitsCheck.class);
346                    xStream.alias("email", EmailCheck.class);
347                    xStream.alias("equalToField", EqualToFieldCheck.class);
348                    xStream.alias("future", FutureCheck.class);
349                    xStream.alias("hasSubstring", HasSubstringCheck.class);
350                    xStream.alias("instanceOf", InstanceOfCheck.class);
351                    xStream.alias("instanceOfAny", InstanceOfAnyCheck.class);
352                    xStream.alias("length", LengthCheck.class);
353                    {
354                            xStream.alias("matchPattern", MatchPatternCheck.class);
355                            xStream.alias("pattern", Pattern.class);
356                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MatchPatternCheck.class, "patterns", Pattern.class);
357                    }
358                    xStream.alias("max", MaxCheck.class);
359                    xStream.alias("maxLength", MaxLengthCheck.class);
360                    xStream.alias("maxSize", MaxSizeCheck.class);
361                    xStream.alias("memberOf", MemberOfCheck.class);
362                    xStream.alias("min", MinCheck.class);
363                    xStream.alias("minLength", MinLengthCheck.class);
364                    xStream.alias("minSize", MinSizeCheck.class);
365                    xStream.alias("noSelfReference", NoSelfReferenceCheck.class);
366                    xStream.alias("notBlank", NotBlankCheck.class);
367                    xStream.alias("notEmpty", NotEmptyCheck.class);
368                    xStream.alias("notEqual", NotEqualCheck.class);
369                    xStream.alias("notEqualToField", NotEqualToFieldCheck.class);
370                    {
371                            xStream.alias("notMatchPattern", NotMatchPatternCheck.class);
372                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(NotMatchPatternCheck.class, "patterns", Pattern.class);
373                    }
374                    xStream.alias("notMemberOf", NotMemberOfCheck.class);
375                    xStream.alias("notNegative", NotNegativeCheck.class);
376                    xStream.alias("notNull", NotNullCheck.class);
377                    xStream.alias("past", PastCheck.class);
378                    xStream.alias("range", RangeCheck.class);
379                    xStream.alias("simpleCheck", SimpleCheck.class);
380                    xStream.alias("size", SizeCheck.class);
381                    xStream.alias("validateWithMethod", ValidateWithMethodCheck.class);
382    
383                    // check exclusions short forms
384                    xStream.alias("nullable", NullableExclusion.class);
385    
386                    // <oval> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.POJOConfigurer
387                    xStream.alias("oval", POJOConfigurer.class);
388                    {
389                            // <constraintSet> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ConstraintSetConfiguration
390                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(POJOConfigurer.class, "constraintSetConfigurations",
391                                            ConstraintSetConfiguration.class);
392                            xStream.alias("constraintSet", ConstraintSetConfiguration.class);
393                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(ConstraintSetConfiguration.class, "checks");
394    
395                            // <class> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ClassConfiguration
396                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(POJOConfigurer.class, "classConfigurations", ClassConfiguration.class);
397                            xStream.alias("class", ClassConfiguration.class);
398                            {
399                                    // <object> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ObjectConfiguration
400                                    xStream.aliasField("object", ClassConfiguration.class, "objectConfiguration");
401                                    {
402                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(ObjectConfiguration.class, "checks");
403                                    }
404                                    // <field> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.FieldConfiguration
405                                    xStream
406                                                    .addImplicitCollection(ClassConfiguration.class, "fieldConfigurations",
407                                                                    FieldConfiguration.class);
408                                    xStream.alias("field", FieldConfiguration.class);
409                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(FieldConfiguration.class, "checks");
410    
411                                    // <parameter> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ParameterConfiguration
412                                    // used within ConstructorConfiguration and MethodConfiguration
413                                    xStream.alias("parameter", ParameterConfiguration.class);
414                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(ParameterConfiguration.class, "checks", Check.class);
415                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(ParameterConfiguration.class, "checkExclusions", CheckExclusion.class);
416    
417                                    // <constructor> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ConstructorConfiguration
418                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(ClassConfiguration.class, "constructorConfigurations",
419                                                    ConstructorConfiguration.class);
420                                    xStream.alias("constructor", ConstructorConfiguration.class);
421                                    {
422                                            // <parameter> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ParameterConfiguration
423                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(ConstructorConfiguration.class, "parameterConfigurations",
424                                                            ParameterConfiguration.class);
425                                    }
426    
427                                    // <method> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.MethodConfiguration
428                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(ClassConfiguration.class, "methodConfigurations",
429                                                    MethodConfiguration.class);
430                                    xStream.alias("method", MethodConfiguration.class);
431                                    {
432                                            // <parameter> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ParameterConfiguration
433                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MethodConfiguration.class, "parameterConfigurations",
434                                                            ParameterConfiguration.class);
435    
436                                            // <returnValue> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.MethodConfiguration.returnValueConfiguration
437                                            // -> MethodReturnValueConfiguration
438                                            xStream.aliasField("returnValue", MethodConfiguration.class, "returnValueConfiguration");
439                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MethodReturnValueConfiguration.class, "checks", Check.class);
440    
441                                            // <pre> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.MethodConfiguration.preExecutionConfiguration ->
442                                            // MethodPreExecutionConfiguration
443                                            xStream.aliasField("preExecution", MethodConfiguration.class, "preExecutionConfiguration");
444                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MethodPreExecutionConfiguration.class, "checks", PreCheck.class);
445                                            xStream.alias("pre", PreCheck.class);
446    
447                                            // <post> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.MethodConfiguration.postExecutionConfiguration ->
448                                            // MethodPpstExecutionConfiguration
449                                            xStream.aliasField("postExcecution", MethodConfiguration.class, "postExecutionConfiguration");
450                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MethodPostExecutionConfiguration.class, "checks", PostCheck.class);
451                                            xStream.alias("post", PostCheck.class);
452                                    }
453                            }
454                    }
455            }
456    
457            public void fromXML(final File input) throws IOException
458            {
459                    final BufferedInputStream bis = new BufferedInputStream(new FileInputStream(input));
460                    try
461                    {
462                            fromXML(bis);
463                    }
464                    finally
465                    {
466                            bis.close();
467                    }
468            }
469    
470            public void fromXML(final InputStream input)
471            {
472                    pojoConfigurer = (POJOConfigurer) xStream.fromXML(input);
473            }
474    
475            public void fromXML(final Reader input)
476            {
477                    pojoConfigurer = (POJOConfigurer) xStream.fromXML(input);
478            }
479    
480            public void fromXML(final String input)
481            {
482                    pojoConfigurer = (POJOConfigurer) xStream.fromXML(input);
483            }
484    
485            /**
486             * {@inheritDoc}
487             */
488            public ClassConfiguration getClassConfiguration(final Class< ? > clazz) throws InvalidConfigurationException
489            {
490                    return pojoConfigurer.getClassConfiguration(clazz);
491            }
492    
493            /**
494             * {@inheritDoc}
495             */
496            public ConstraintSetConfiguration getConstraintSetConfiguration(final String constraintSetId)
497                            throws InvalidConfigurationException
498            {
499                    return pojoConfigurer.getConstraintSetConfiguration(constraintSetId);
500            }
501    
502            /**
503             * @return the pojoConfigurer
504             */
505            public POJOConfigurer getPojoConfigurer()
506            {
507                    return pojoConfigurer;
508            }
509    
510            /**

514            {

516            }
517    
518            /**
519             * @param pojoConfigurer the pojoConfigurer to set
520             */
521            public void setPojoConfigurer(final POJOConfigurer pojoConfigurer)
522            {
523                    this.pojoConfigurer = pojoConfigurer;
524            }
525    
526            public synchronized String toXML()
527            {
528                    return xStream.toXML(pojoConfigurer);
529            }
530    
531            public synchronized void toXML(final OutputStream out)
532            {
533                    xStream.toXML(pojoConfigurer, out);
534            }
535    
536            public synchronized void toXML(final Writer out)
537            {
538                    xStream.toXML(pojoConfigurer, out);
539            }
